about_the_game:
Ukrainians: Our battle is a visual novel that will give you a wide range of opportunities to explore life in the country during the war. Feel yourself in the role of a volunteer, on whose shoulders a great responsibility fell in one moment. The game is filled with various graphic scenes and deep text stories that will not leave anyone behind. What dynamics does the country live in during the war: economy and business, education and science, sport, tourism, energy, police and other industries. Learn new facts for yourself and immerse yourself in these stories.

Dive into the exciting atmosphere of the game

In this game, you will travel to different locations, interact with people and situations that are based on real events. The war radically changed the life of every Ukrainian, and in this game you will be able to understand the features of the new reality. You are a volunteer and the army and civilians rely on you, but at the same time you also have a family and the need to look out for the well-being of everyone close to you. The game does not have a narrow direction, but on the contrary comprehensively reveals the life of the hero in the conditions of war. Every time you will be faced with a choice that will affect the further development of events both for you and for those around you.

Travel the country

Your duties require you to travel constantly and change locations regularly. Here you will be able to visit the most diverse places you can imagine: city and village, forest, lake, river, sea, field, mountains, school, university, hospital, shop, warehouse, farm, museum, subway, bomb shelter and even military fortifications near the front line. Each of these and many other locations is accompanied by its own history and tasks. Depending on where you are, you may face danger or, on the contrary, a pleasant surprise. Be careful: an enemy sniper may be waiting for you near the front. Don't wear bright clothes this time!

Complete the tasks

You can't relax for a second! There are many challenges ahead! You need to constantly perform various tasks. It can be anything from everyday cooking and psychological help to children (entertain them: put together puzzles or solve a riddle), ending with complex missions to deliver weapons to the front. Look for elements on the scene that will help you move on and collect them in your inventory, mark destination points on the maps, build a strategy for your further actions. In particular, you will have to play the role of a detective and solve complex mysteries. Some tasks will be quite easy to perform, and some will be difficult. Sometimes you should show your attentiveness, and sometimes you should use logic and memory to the maximum in order to cope with a new task on time.

Interact with the world

The game gives you the opportunity to learn about the world and its elements, as well as interact with different people. Every object on your way can become important: a house or car key, a phone, a first aid kit, models of military equipment, tanks, planes, ships, and sometimes even a board game, book or anime-style comic. As a volunteer, your circle of contacts is very wide: teachers, doctors, soldiers and officers, politicians, business owners. You are not a superhero, but you will have to become one in order to find time to do all your things.

Study history

February 24, 2022. Millions of people will remember this date for the rest of their lives. The country did not have time to recover from the Covid-19 epidemic when a full-scale war began. In the game Ukrainians: Our battle, you will be able to get acquainted with the course of events in Ukraine starting from the first minute of the invasion to the present day. During the entire time of events in the game, the situation will change from very tense to more controlled. Events will unfold not only in favorable weather, but in all conditions, because ahead of you are winter, spring, summer, autumn, heat, thunderstorm, blizzard, downpour and mud, as well as often lack of light and heat. Find out how Ukrainians survived in such conditions and what other difficulties arose in different periods of time.

Key features of the game

  • stories based on real events

  • many locations and levels

  • the unfolding of events and the ending depend on your choice

  • a large number of the most diverse tasks

Ukrainians: Our battle contains many more locations and secrets. What other secrets are there? Explore to find out!

WARNING! 50% of the net profit from the sale of copies of the game on Steam will be sent to the needs of the Ukrainian army and other social assistance.
